Kettering.Kettering City School District:
Kettering City School District is a school district located in Kettering, Ohio.It was named a "Top 100" school district by Money magazine in 1995. It is the second largest district in Montgomery County and currently serves about 8,000 students and has enjoyed modest growth in enrollment since the early 1990s.


== Classes & programs ==
Students at the middle and high schools can choose from among more than 200 courses during their secondary years.
